wordGroup: without rebuke 无可指摘的；无可非议的

sentences.en: He was silenced by her stinging rebuke.
sentences.cn: 她的尖锐批评使他哑口无言。

sentences.en: His statements drew a stinging rebuke from the chairman.
sentences.cn: 他的申明受到了主席严厉的谴责。

sentences.en: I would not judge nor rebuke them.
sentences.cn: 我既不会审判他们，也不会谴责他们。
